metadata.title: CVE-2021-4076 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw exists in tang, a network-based cryptographic binding server, whichcould result in leak of private keys.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tang - 11-1
tang-common - 11-1
tang-xinetd - 11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tang package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '11-1').
